articles.author: Adrian Weckler
articles.title: Explainer: what Amazon's new Dublin mega-warehouse means for Irish shoppers - Independent.ie
articles.description: AMAZON today announced it will open its first ‘fulfilment’ mega-warehouse in Baldonnell, west Co Dublin. The 630,000sq ft facility will store millions of items for delivery on the island of Ireland and in some European countries. Here’s what…

articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: 'Mu' Covid variant potentially of concern, EU agency says - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency said Thursday a coronavirus variant known as "Mu" could be cause for concern, although there is no data yet to show it will overtake the dominant Delta strain.
articles.content:
The European Medicines Agency said Thursday a coronavirus variant known as "Mu" could be cause for concern, although there is no data yet to show it will overtake the dominant Delta strain.

articles.title: The Latest: European agency to decide on 4 more vaccines - Seymour Tribune
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency expects to decide on whether four more coronavirus vaccines, including ones made by China and Russia, should be recommended for authorization across Europe by the end of the year

articles.author: Jan Cronje
articles.title: Final vote in Steinhoff's multibillion-rand settlement plan delayed - News24
articles.description: The final vote by claimants in the plan by retailer Steinhoff to pay out around R25 billion in compensation to settle a host of lawsuits in South Africa and Europe has been delayed, with no reasons given.
articles.content:
